name: Safari 15 browser mockup (macOS)
description:
Safari 15 browser mockup

I always screenshot safari and make assets for Thursday, so I thought let me just sit down and make a figma version.


Update 18 May 2022:

  • Added Safari icon in the dock with open indicator


Update 30 April 2022:

  • Minimal mode: turns tab bar into a minimal version


Version 1:

  • Multiple tabs
  • Light/Dark mode toggles
  • Pinned tabs
  • Custom address bar colors
  • Custom desktop wallpaper


Special thanks to @joeyabanks for his macOS 12 monterey figma kit :)
